attention.title: ATTENTION!
attention.description: The management of PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka (PT RFB) urges the public to remain vigilant against investment fraudulent schemes using PT RFB's name through electronic and social media. Ensure that all fund transfers for futures trading transactions are made only to a segregated account in the name of PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka, not to any personal accounts.

company.title: PT RIFAN FINANCINDO BERJANGKA
